overview: Behind closed doors, they're just two women who crave something a little unconventional. In the 49th installment of Lesbian Seductions, we see the journey from desire, to pursuit, to surrender as two different generations of gorgeous women come together to give in to lesbian temptations. This movie features over 2 hours of seductive girl-on-girl action, starring RayVeness, Jessie Parker, Shyla Jennings, Darla Crane, and many more!
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender!
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 49
